title: early 1900s player postcards wanted - in many sets
author: timn1

posts.post_title: early 1900s player postcards wanted - in many sets
posts.post_content:
Still looking for many in these sets (and other similar issues).

Let me know what you have available!

American Lg. Publishing Co. Postcards
Detroit Free Press Postcards 
Rotograph Giants Postcards
Ullman Postcards (Gilbert, Henry Mathewson, Teams)
White Sox (Suhling) Postcards
Hull White Sox Postcards
Pirates Vignette Postcards
Souvenir Shop of Cleveland Postcards
H. M. Taylor Postcards (Donovan floral horseshoe only)
Topping Tigers Postcards

Check out my postcard collection at :

[url]https://imageevent.com/apspr/baseballcards/baseballpostcards[/url]
Still searching for many cards from these great sets-

Tim,

Are you only looking for single player postcards or are you looking for team shots from those sets as well?

Eric Angyal

Always looking for my wants in these and other postcard sets - 

if you have other player postcards available that aren't listed here, let me know, as my interests extend to such sets as Rotograph Giants Postcards, Pirates Vignette Postcards, Souvenir Shop of Cleveland Postcards, 1912 Boston American Postcards, etc.   I am also interested in several of the accordion fold-out postcards of the 1900s-

CURRENT PARTIAL WANTLIST

Dietsche Tigers PCs C. 1908 or 1909 only: D. Jones, Schaefer, Thomas, Winter

Dietsche Cubs 1907: Tinker

Ullman Postcards: Gilbert, Christy and Henry Mathewson, Cubs Team

American League Publishing Co. Postcards: CLEVELAND: Clarkson, Flick, Hess, Perring, Rhoades    
TEAMS: Athletics, Cardinals, Cubs, Naps, Tigers, White Sox

1907 Philadelphia Evening Telegraph Postcards: Dooin

1907 Morgan “Red Belt” Postcards: Opening of the Season  

1907-09 H. M. Taylor Postcards: Crawford, Donovan [floral horseshoe]

1908 Detroit Free Press Postcards: ALL BUT Mullin, O’Leary

Topping Press Tigers Postcards: Crawford, Jennings, D. Jones, McIntyre, Moriarty, O’Leary, Schmidt, Speer, Works

Suhling/$ in Shield Cubs/White Sox Postcards: Cubs: Cubs Team    White Sox: Comiskey, Davis, Dougherty  

Grignon Cubs Postcards: Moran, Overall, Sheckard, Steinfeldt, Tinker

Hull White Sox postcards: Donahue, Hahn, Isbell, Jones, McFarland, Patterson, Sullivan, Walsh, White

1932 New York Giants Schedule Postcards: Allen, Bell, Critz, Fitzsimmons, Healy, Koenecke, Leslie, Luque, Mooney, Terry

1933 Charles Denby Cigars: English, Hornsby

Orcajo Reds Postcards, including Val Decker, Metropolitan Clothing, WHIO Radio: [any condition] Cascarella, Cuyler, George Davis, Virgil Davis, Hollingsworth, Johnson, Kampouris, Moore [correct photo], Riggs [close-up portrait], Scarcella [misspelled], Schott

posts.post_title: still need many of the postcards in these sets
posts.post_content:
annual bump of the thread - let me know if anything is available-

Tim

I might have an 1812 Boston American postcard. Let me check :)

See ya'll in about 3 weeks. Long live LUTFA
